column5: The financial world’s demand for innovation and new technologies has always been intense. Today, as international markets become even more complex, the need for specialists who understand advanced systems and sophisticated financial instruments has never been greater.Our MSc Finance and Data Analytics is designed for graduates who are keen to gain specialisation in data analytics with core knowledge in finance. This Master’s degree offers you a blend of technical, quantitative modules in data analytics, alongside accounting and finance modules that will develop your ability to apply data analytics and technology to related practices and real-world examples.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
